programme.desc: T.I. tries to instill a tougher edge in his children by taking them to a boxing gym. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael, suspecting that Jr. lacks parenting skills, challenges him to care for a fake baby (actually, a water balloon) for a week. Meanwhile, Kady wants to know how babies are made. “You're over the stork story, huh?” Jay asks. “Way past it,” she replies. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. has been getting friendly with a coworker named Larry (Sean Whalen), who ups the friendship ante considerably when his grandmother dies. Meanwhile, Claire sprains her ankle tripping over Kady's skateboard, so Michael makes Kady Claire's “personal assistant.” Jr.: George O. Gore II. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Vanessa (Brooklyn Sudano) has her ultrasound, but doesn't want to know the baby's sex. Neither does Jr. Only Michael wants to know. Meanwhile, Kady is enamored of a young dancer named Smilin' Willie (Elliot Cho). This upsets not only Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey), but Claire as well. It seems that Willie has a crush on her, and won't leave her alone. Jasmine: Ella Joyce. Calvin: Rasta. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay's training hard to run a marathon; Michael not so hard ("I'm on my regimen---it's called the eat, drink and be merry regimen"). Meanwhile, Tony (Andrew McFarlane) is feeling incredibly guilty because he finds Clare "incredibly sexy." (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: A pool party at the hotel turns frosty for Fancy (Garcelle Beauvais), who gets locked in the freezer with Jamie and Braxton (Christopher B. Duncan). Junior: Garrett Morris. Helen: Ellia English. Enrique: Jamie Foxx. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: All fingers point to Braxton (Christopher B. Duncan) after a string of thefts at the hotel. Gladys: Montrose Hagins. Mr. Holmes: Ken Kimmins. Tyrone Koppel: Jamie Foxx. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Junior: Garrett Morris. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: The Employee Formerly Known as Prince
programme.desc: An African prince (Clifton Powell) takes a job at the hotel and pursues Fancy (Garcelle Beauvais) as his future princess. Jamie: Jamie Foxx. Cherise: Kellita Smith. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.sub-title: One Flew over the County's Nest
programme.desc: A knock on the head lands Jamie in the hospital, where he's mistakenly committed to the psychiatric ward. Arthur: Ali Woodson. Chante: Kimberly Moss. Mr. Official: Christopher Carroll. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: On a date with another woman, Will feels the power of love---for Lisa (Nia Long). Susan Powter appears as herself. Philip: James Avery. Carlotta: Enya Flack. Dana: Hill Harper. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will goes overboard to make a good first impression on Lisa's father (John Amos)---and soon regrets it. Lisa: Nia Long. Will: Will Smith. Philip: James Avery. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Geoffrey: Joseph Marcell. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will gets roped into a ski trip with Carlton---whose plans are put on ice when Lisa (Nia Long) arrives. Back home, Hilary prepares to leave the nest. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Angie: Angelle Brooks. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: A web of deceit surrounds a college party that Will attends---and where Ashley is found with a football player. Tina: Cee Cee Harshaw. Jana: Ajai Sanders. Lisa: Nia Long. Ashley: Tatyana M. Ali. Bennie: J. Lamont Pope. Michel: Louis R. Plante. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: In counseling, Will and Lisa hope to move on up to a new understanding in preparation for marriage. Sherman Hemsley and Isabel Sanford appear. Dr. Whitehorn: Don Lake. Lisa: Nia Long. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will and Lisa's wedding plans get out of hand when Lisa's dad (John Amos) and Philip can't agree on the arrangements, so the couple heads for Las Vegas. Minister: Isaac Hayes. Samantha: Arnetia Walker-Francis. Angela: Cynthena Sanders. Lisa: Nia Long. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Drewski wants to put Bianca on a track, but his girlfriend disapproves of his plan. Later, Snoop and J question their future together; and Yandy tries to keep the peace within her family, but rumors about Samantha lead to trouble. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Yandy encounters Erika and Samantha; J gets angry with Sofi Green; and Rich's daughter travels to NYC to check on his new girlfriend. Later, Cardi's furious after discovering that Swift is in a relationship. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Cardi faces the consequences of her actions; Drewski's torn between business and pleasure; and Kimbella makes a discovery about Juelz. Later, Rich's girlfriend encounters someone from his past. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Bianca opens up about her feelings for Drewski, leading Sky to intervene. Later, Snoop confronts her past and makes a decision about her future with J; and tensions between Yandy and Erika escalate. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Bianca seeks revenge on MariahLynn; Drewski tries to win Sky's heart; Mendeecees intervenes in Yandy and Erika's feud; and Rich tells Self about Cisco. Later, Yandy makes an announcement that changes everything. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Yandy's secret has ripple effects; Remy makes a bold business decision to spend more time with Papoose; and MariahLynn juggles her personal and professional drama. Later, Peter Gunz tries to restore order to the Creep Squad. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Program muzyczny
programme.desc: Zestawienie największych przebojów z Polski i zagranicy

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Zbliża się rocznica ślubu rodziców Gretchen. Haase ma mało czasu, by znaleźć partnera na tę uroczystość. Przyjaciółka umawia ją na randkę w ciemno, ale kandydat okazuje się mało interesujący

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki
programme.desc: Gretchen bierze udział w testach tabletek na odchudzanie. Prowadzący badania doktor ignoruje poważne efekty uboczne, które wywołuje specyfik. W efekcie Gretchen musi ratować siebie i 20 innych osób

programme.title: Sala operacyjna: waga ciężka
programme.desc: Karolina została przyjęta do szpitala warunkowo, bo znowu przytyła. Coraz bardziej dokucza jej ból kręgosłupa. Prof. Paśnik kwalifikuje ją do operacji. Z kolei 40-letni Artur jest bohaterem pierwszej edycji "Sali operacyjnej", kiedy to jego waga wynosiła 150 kg. Po zabiegu schudł 55 kg i nadal trzyma formę. Artur stara się wykorzystać swoją wiedzę i doświadczenie, by pomagać innym. Przyjechał do szpitala na konsultację z dietetykiem, bo pomimo starań przestał chudnąć. Dodatkowym problemem jest wisząca skóra - pamiątka po utraconych kilogramach. Tymczasem Ela zdecydowała się wreszcie iść na zakupy po nowe ubrania

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Widzowie dowiedzą się, jak dobrze wypaść na pierwszej randce, jakich błędów nie popełniać, gdzie się umówić. Rad udzielą m.in. Jarosław Jakimowicz, Zygmunt Chajzer, Małgorzata Kosik czy Tomasz Niecik(r)

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Widzowie dowiedzą się, jak dobrze wypaść na pierwszej randce, jakich błędów nie popełniać, gdzie się umówić. Rad udzielą m.in. Jarosław Jakimowicz, Zygmunt Chajzer, Małgorzata Kosik czy Tomasz Niecik(r)

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Joanna od zawsze była najlepsza we wszystkim. Nie do końca potrafi się przez to odnaleźć w pracy. Ma problemy z wypowiadaniem swojego zdania. Boi się, że to, co powie albo zrobi, nie będzie idealne(r)

programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju oraz ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw sprawdzonych informacji, które mogą mieć znaczący wpływ na ich życie

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Zbiór praktycznych porad dotyczących życia. Twórcy radzą m.in., jak przygotować coś dobrego do jedzenia lub zrobić ciekawy prezent bądź przydatny gadżet z rozmaitych przedmiotów codziennego użytku(n)

programme.title: Po prostu po włosku
programme.sub-title: Ravioli in Uovo, Pappardelle, Beetroot Pasta, Tortelli
programme.desc: Prowadząca program Walijka Michela Chiappa udaje się do Włoch, skąd pochodzi jej rodzina, by dowiedzieć się wszystkiego na temat makaronów wszelkich kształtów i rozmiarów. Przekona widzów, że ze świeżego makaronu można przyrządzać naprawdę przepyszne i - co najważniejsze - nieskomplikowane dania. Pokaże im, jak dzięki temu produktowi zmienić nawet najprostszy posiłek we wspaniałą włoską ucztę(n)

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Norwegię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Tym razem jadą do Norwegii(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Ku zaskoczeniu Jane wychodzi na jaw, że Teri i Iana łączy wspólna przeszłość. Stacy coraz bardziej denerwuje się przed weselem. Boi się, że jej najlepsza przyjaciółka może nie dotrzeć na ceremonię(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Modelka Deb Dobson ginie w wypadku samochodowym. Powraca na ziemię w asyście niebiańskiego przewodnika Freda. Za jego sprawą otrzymuje nową ziemską powłokę ambitnej prawniczki Jane Bingum(n)

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiadają na miejscu kierowcy. Instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para ma trzy dni na poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem(n)

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: Marcin czeka na operację wycięcia guza szczęki. Boi się związanego z nią ryzyka i bólu, ale wie, że nie może dłużej zwlekać, gdyż nowotwór staje się coraz większy i mogą nastąpić przerzuty. Mężczyzna w domu zostawił żonę i dwójkę małych dzieci. Ma nadzieję, że dadzą sobie bez niego radę(n)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. When Les and team awesomise the school's boring teacher, they unwittingly unleash the jealousy of the school's coolest teacher. Then, Lars is kicked out of the glee club because his singing is too awesome, so the team swaps his voice for that of tone deaf Les to brighten up the usually boring Spring Concert.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Living in Shooblivion/McNinja - Brought to You by McFist.
programme.desc: Double bill. Ninja seeks the help of the blind swordsmith of Norrisville. Then, the superhero learns the dangers of selling out.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. Wander tries to resist the temptation to open a box he's meant to deliver. Then, Wander gets lost on a dangerous planet and Sylvia uses his magical hat to find him.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer loses his guitar-pick necklace and cannot see Billy any more. Billy is so desperate for attention he inadvertently convinces Hugh and Jane the house is haunted. Then, Spencer enters a Halloween competition to find the best haunted house. The winner gets to work with a famous special effects director and Lolo is determined to thwart Spencer.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer gets what he deserves when he cons Hugh into taking him on a camping trip so he can shoot a desert-themed horror movie.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat scratches Coop under a full moon, and Dennis is convinced his best friend will turn into a Were-Cat. Then, home alone on Halloween, Kat communicates with the Cat Nebula, setting up a rendezvous, while Coop and Dennis try to stop a feline invasion.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: In Dog We Trust/Catch My Drift.
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop brings a stray dog into the house to provide some competition for Kat, and when heavy snow falls, Millie drags Kat along to witness Coop taking part in a tobogganing competition.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: After discovering his family is moving because Norrisville is getting too dangerous, Randy decides he must defeat Cyborg Julian and make his town safe so that his parents will change their mind.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Last Stall on the Left/Got Stank.
programme.desc: Double bill. New kid Randy Cunningham is the latest in a long line of ninjas who have protected Norrisville High School for 800 years. On his first day at school he faces danger. Randy and Howard try to get themselves into the cool seats for the school game by painting themselves with blue body paint.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Ozzy plays a trick on Rafik, who thinks Boyster is to blame. Then, Boyster enters a Mexican wrestling match to get money to buy Lola a Mother's Day gift.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Part two of two. The first king's evil twin Kalakai teams up with Lanny and puts Brady under a spell. Now turned evil, Brady plots to get Boomer's king ring and see Kalakai crowned.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Boomer blames Mr Boogey when a pair of Brady's favourite sneakers is stolen. Everyone on Kinkow thinks Boomer is lying, except Mason who has been harbouring a secret.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The stepbrothers build a biodome in the backyard, so Isabella can get her Fireside Girl patch in spite of the rain.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace loses a present from Jeremy, so asks the boys to recreate it by using information from her subconscious - but the results are not what she expects.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: The Clarke household is in crisis. Will's nanobots are rapidly failing, and Nick is at a loss. Determined to save his son, Nick lays aside his initial suspicions when Katherine appears with a high-tech solution. Will comes round and, despite a nano-hangover, seems well. But, as Nick knows, he is not out of danger yet - Katherine has supplied only a temporary fix. Heeding Nick's warning, Eve tracks down Peterson with Abe in tow. At his old address, they are met by the new resident, Mr Roberts, who denies knowing the whereabouts of Mr Peterson, though Eve's suspicions are alerted when she scans a Calimov pass in the hallway. With Nick taking Will into Calimov, Eve decides it's best to be by his side, leaving Abe to investigate alone. The nano charge has had a surprising effect on Will; Lily and Eve are bemused as he relays abstract scientific theorems. As part of his ongoing therapy, Katherine administers another charge, but this time Will's body has an adverse reaction, causing him to freeze. When Mr Roberts appears, with nanotech, it becomes clear there is a deeper connection between him and Peterson. He stabilises Will, and tries to exit, but Eve is on to him. Though at first he denies he is her father, Eve has guessed the truth. Katherine confirms his identity, and claims to have brought him back with the sole purpose of saving Will. Back at Eden Farm, meanwhile, Abe discovers what Peterson has really been hiding: Rebecca, confined in his makeshift lab, supplying him with nanobots to find the cure for Will. Despite Abe's concern, she swears him to silence. But can Abe keep quiet?.
